short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that helps you control your web browsing time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you feel like you've been spending too much time on a particular website? Simply add that website to the block list, then Hang-on extension will allow you to pause for a few seconds before continuing browsing, giving you the option to decide whether to proceed.
